Recommendations: The Institution may consider to revisit and enhance the MMSU Code and integrate new provisions attuned to the challenges of globalization and AEAN Integration towards the attainment of its Vision, Goals, and Objectives.
The College is encouraged to establish international linkages and networking where faculty members can engage in professional development.
Hired faculty may be encouraged to pursue advanced education through a provision of Scholarship programs and possibly send them to recognized and accredited universities abroad if budget warrants.

Performance evaluation results be disseminated to the academic personnel and staff who may be provided with copies of their ratings as basis for improving their performance and to be more efficient and effective in the delivery of services.
Good practices and improvement of the performance of the academic personnel towards attainment of the university vision and target objectives may be sustained.
